reviews.content: This place is a great Vietnamese bbq and hotpot restaurant. The staff is friendly and attentive and the meat servings are thick and generous and of decent quality. This place is affordable, too. For 8 people, BBQ and hotpot and drinks, including beer came to 1,600,000vnd (~$70).
Tasty foods, good service and dirt cheap. Highly recommended!
